column2: so the wedding caterer sent me this list of twelve appetizers and i have to narrow it down to six
so did monica tell you about this great band called the swing kings that we’re trying to get to play at the wedding
since when are you into swing music
i used to go all over town listening to bands
do you want me to call
you just stick to your job
this is impossible monica why don’t you just pick all 15
should we uh go try to talk to her
that’s one of the great things about being engaged
i’m not nervous talking to pretty girls anymore
let me let me get that for you
so hi i’m uh i’m ross and this is my friend chandler
are you uh new to the area ‘cause if you are…i’d love to show you around sometime
i…i uh actually just moved from four blocks over
but but this block is like a whole other world
y’know actually it does have a very interesting history
uh this street is the first street in the city to have an underground sewer system
before that sewage and waste would just flow right down the street
umm say you’re gonna be starving after all this moving
what do you say i take you to dinner tonight
uh let me take this up for you
am i crazy or does this totally go
thank you rachel but look at monica
i can’t believe i found it
if i knew you i’d cry
well i’m monica geller ball like a baby
have you found your dress yet
oh no these dresses are all so amazing but there is no way i could afford one
no i can’t afford this either
i i i’m i’m just here to figure out which one i want then i’m gonna get it at kleinman’s this discount place in brooklyn day after tomorrow they are having a huge sale
so so when are you getting married
oh i’m not i just like to try these on
so when are you getting married
did he show you the photos of the nude wedding he did
i almost called off my wedding
oh my fiancee wants the swing kings
my fiancee wants the heavy metal band carcass
ooh is that spelled with a ‘c’ or a ‘k’
it doesn’t matter they’re both great
now that you know what you want you should go to kleinman’s and get it half off
so does this come in another color or…
you uh movin’ in or movin’ out
oh uh can i give you a hand
because a guy who was helping me before had to leave because he hurt his back
oh wow what a beautiful name
so uh do you live around here
hey listen let me give you a little tip
do not take a nap on this stoop or you can wake up with your shoes gone
listen would you uh would you like to have dinner with me tonight
oh i i have plans tonight
okay alright well where does this go
you look strong why don’t i take that and you grab one of the boxes
there is usually only one dress in each size so when they open those doors fan out
now this is what you’re looking for
when you locate the dress blow on these
when you hear it come running
and now you’ll see me buying it
you wouldn’t even have known about this place if it wasn’t for me
look you don’t want to fight me
you gotta get me out of here phoebe
so ross how was your date the other night
did you tell her about the magical ride that starts with the flush of every toilet
laugh all you want but uh she actually left me a message saying she’d like to go out again
yeah in fact i’m gonna go call her right now
and i’ll make sure to tell her my friend chandler says…
listen sorry i didn’t stop by last night but i had a date
uh joe when it’s one o’clock in the morning and you don’t come by
well check it out i was with this really hot girl who just moved in right across the street
but i just found she’s also seeing some other guy
what would you do if you were in ross’s situation
i mean yeah i’m dating this girl who’s also seeing another guy
but i don’t know i’m not too worried about it
believe me i wouldn’t want to be the guy who’s up against you
i mean that doofus is going to lose
i wish i didn’t have to go believe me
oh uh by the way what’s the name of the girl you’re dating
well obviously only one of us can keep dating her
well now let’s let’s look at this objectively i think i should date her…
or or i’m the one who dates her
that’s interesting but check this out
yeah yeah i like that but just to go in another direction…
this can go on for a while
yeah well we should order some food then
look why don’t why don’t we just let her decide
hey hey we’ll each go out with her one more time
and and we’ll see who she likes best
maybe i’ll take her to that new french restaurant down the street…
ah yeah wait a second now
look we’re gonna have to set a spending limit on the date
i don’t have the money to take her to a fancy place like that
well sorry that’s what i do on dates
all right well i guess i’ll just have to do what i do on dates
so let’s decide on the spending limit…
i was thinking more like a hundred
she booked the swing kings on the day of our wedding and said that i couldn’t have them back unless i gave her the dress
does that mean carcass is available
well just figure out a way to talk him out of it
i just wanted to come by and y’know wish you good luck on your date
what time are you meeting her
we have 8 00 reservations at gramercy bistro
did you give yourself a facial
i have an oily t zone
hey you uh you sent kristen flowers
uh actually i sent the flowers before the actual date
so technically technically i didn’t break any rules
so that’s the way it’s gonna be huh
yeah i can break the rules too y’know
i’m not gonna let you get away with this
i don’t think you have much choice
joey got meat sauce on the banister again
yeah swing music is so out
phoebe he’s gotta be in the room for that to work
what are you guys talking about
well umm we were just talking about the y’know the swing kings and just wondering whether y’know they were the right way to go
yeah i went to a wedding once where they had swing music and uh two months later the couple got divorced
and now i’m not saying that there’s any connection here y’know but they did tell me that’s why they got divorced
y’know they suck so much that people actually die at their concerts they just stop living
look all i know is when monica and i went to see them we had fun
well what is the other reason
well you have to because maybe it’s stupid
well it’s just while monica and i were dancing to them it was…the first time i knew that…you were the woman i wanted to dance all my dances with
so they said our table will be ready in just a few minutes
i guess the more muscles you have the more they can spasm out of control
and technically technically i’m not breaking any rules so i…
i used to have a friend named joey
our table will be ready in a couple minutes
i would love to wait with you guys
so joey umm you look familiar
are uh are you on tv or something
well joey doesn’t like to talk about it but he’s one of the stars of days of our lives
that’s right don’t you play a woman
a woman in a man’s body
so y’know ross it’s funny ‘cause you look familiar to me too
in fact umm just the other day kristen and i were talking about how i’ve been married and how i have a son
so you’ve just married the one time then
hey joey have you ever been so hungry on a date that when a girl goes to the bathroom you ate some of her food
you said the waiter ate my crab cake
so uh ross well now why did that first marriage breakup
was it because the woman was straight or she was a lesbian
do you two know each other
it just seems like ross is the kind of a guy that would marry a woman on the verge of being a lesbian and then push her over the edge
were you on a poster for gonorrhea
have you ever slept in the same bed as a monkey
hey you leave marcel out of this
have you ever got stuck in a pair of your own leather pants
hey hey have you ever locked yourself in a tv cabinet vd boy
when do you think we lost her
do you have another boyfriend in there or something
we only mess around at his place
y’know it’s funny i started it but now it’s scaring me
so could you come out here please
no i’m wearing a wedding dress
oh you got a wedding dress
yeah but i’m not keeping it
well then why can’t i see it
okay but i i have to return it so you can’t like it
yeah that’s like the most ugliest dress i’ve ever seen
wh why do you have to return it
oh by the way i i booked the swing kings
but that dress i mean it’s like yuck
it makes me wanna just rip it right off of you
do you wanna look at the song list for the wedding
i thought you were gonna be gone all day
i i should probably leave you girls alone
yeah laugh all you want but in ten minutes we’re gonna have younger looking skin
y’know she could use a little… oh nice shot
